title: Marie Curie
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,545 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1090L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     V and Z1
description: The work of Marie Curie revolutionized scientific understanding of the nature of atoms and opened up new frontiers in medicine. Marie Curie is a detailed account of this remarkable woman's legacy in the face of discrimination and struggle. The book can be used to teach students the elements of a biography. The book and lesson are also available for levels V and Z1.
